translation.en: I shouldn't have done it.
And I don't even feel bad for lying for your wife.
translation.ko: 부인을 위해 거짓말하고 죄책감을 느끼진 않았지만

translation.en: But I hate myself for telling you the truth. I am so sorry.
With my words, even though they were true, I ended a marriage.
translation.ko: 내 말 때문에 결국 한 결혼은 파탄이 났어요

translation.en: Looking back, that's the thing I regret the most.
So now everyone that knows the truth is either gone or they won't fess up.
translation.ko: 이제 진실을 아는 사람은 떠났거나 함구할 거예요

translation.en: And Marianne Bryant and her disciples are demanding my head.
translation.ko: 마리안 브라이언트 일당은 날 못 잡아먹어 안달이고요

translation.en: The messed-up thing is I would not put it past Principal Gibbons to expel me.
translation.ko: 문제는 기번스 교장이 날 퇴학시킬 거예요

translation.en: I had a similar situation when I was your age.
translation.ko: 나도 너만 할 때 비슷한 경험을 했어

translation.en: What? Everyone called you a slut?
I had a horrible reputation and people said awful things about me.
-Why? -Because I was a slut.
I slept with a whole bunch of people. A slew, a heap, a peck. Mostly guys.
translation.ko: 안 잔 사람이 없어 거지, 주정뱅이, 여자까지

translation.en: -Mom. -Sorry, I got around.
Before I met Dad, I had incredibly low self-worth.
translation.ko: 아빠를 만나기 전에 나를 하찮게 생각했어

translation.en: Do me a favor and just stuff this down my throat until I asphyxiate to death.
translation.ko: 나 숨 막혀 죽을 때까지 이걸 목에 쑤셔 넣어 줘요

translation.en: -It's true. It is. -I want to die.
It's true. I was quite the contortionist.
I could do this thing. I could go-- I mean, my leg all the way--
translation.ko: 이런 것도 했어 내 다리를 머리 뒤로...

translation.en: Stop. Can you stop? Don't show me.
-Can you not see that I'm a mess? -No, you're not, Olive.
translation.ko: - 나 엉망인 거 안 보여요? - 넌 괜찮아, 올리브

translation.en: You're wonderful.
And you'll handle this the same way I did.
With an incontrovertible sense of humor.
But you're much smarter than I am...
...so you'll come out of this much better than I did.
Thank you, Mom.
-I could get my leg so far back. -No, no, no. Stop it.
translation.ko: - 다리가 여기까지 갔어 - 제발 그만 해요

translation.en: So it was time to put an end to all this once and for all...
translation.ko: 이 모든 것에 종지부를 찍기 위해서

translation.en: ...by telling my side of the story.
And that's why I decided to do this webcast.
So here we go.
Part five.
Not with a fizzle, but with a bang.
Today we had yet another one of our ridiculous pep rallies.
Todd convinced the band to play the sexiest song in their repertoire.
translation.ko: 토드는 밴드에 가장 섹시한 곡을 연주하라고 했고

translation.en: I needed to pique everyone's interest to get them to go home and log on.
translation.ko: 전 모두 집에 가서 컴퓨터를 켜도록 유도해야 했죠

translation.en: I had one outfit left and I figured about 30 seconds to do it.
translation.ko: 마지막 남은 의상을 입고 30초 안에 끝내야 했어요

translation.en: Plus I really wanted my own awesome musical number...
translation.ko: 별 이유는 없었지만 근사한 뮤지컬 곡을

translation.en: ...for no apparent reason.
Is that Olive?
This was just a free preview.
For the main event, log on to www.FreeOlive.com tonight at 6 p.m.
And I know it interferes with the basketball game but, come on...
...would you rather cheer on the Woodchucks...
...or watch me do one?
What do you think you're doing? Get to my office right now.
translation.ko: 뭣 하는 건가? 당장 교장실로 가지

translation.en: I can't, because I have a date with the guy I like and the rest of the school.
translation.ko: 안 돼요, 좋아하는 남자와 전교생과 데이트가 있어요

translation.en: I think before you expel me, you might wanna talk to Mrs. Griffith...
translation.ko: 저 퇴학시키기 전에 상담 선생님을 만나세요

translation.en: ...because I think she might talk you into letting me stay.
translation.ko: 그럼 절 학교에 있도록 설득하실 거예요

translation.en: Go, Woodchucks!
And here you all are...
...waiting outside the bedroom door for me to kiss Todd...
translation.ko: 침실 밖에서 내가 토드에게 키스하길 기다리고

translation.en: ...listening to me pretend to have sex with Brandon...
translation.ko: 내가 브랜던과 가짜로 섹스하는 걸 듣고

translation.en: ...paying me to lie for you...
...and calling me every name in the book.
You know, it was just like Hester in The Scarlet Letter.
Except that's the one thing the movies don't tell you:
translation.ko: 영화에서는 한 가지 빠진 것이 있지만요

translation.en: How shitty it feels to be an outcast. Warranted or not.
translation.ko: 외톨이가 된다는 건 정말 괴롭다는 사실 말이죠

translation.en: How did you know I love this song?
translation.ko: 이 노래 좋아하는 거 어떻게 알았어?

translation.en: I guessed.
I see you've been watching my live webcast. It's still going on, you know.
translation.ko: 내 방송을 봤구나 아직 안 끝났어

translation.en: Screw them. They've had enough of you. Figuratively speaking.
translation.ko: 그냥 무시해 너도 할 만큼 했잖아

translation.en: I borrowed my neighbor's mower. I came right over.
That almost rhymed.
I know. I spent a minute on it.
I'll be right down.
That's Todd.
Not that I owe you guys any more confessions, but I really like this guy...
translation.ko: 이제 더 할 얘기가 없고 토드가 너무 좋아요

translation.en: ...and I might even lose my virginity to him.
I don't know when it'll happen.
You know, it might be five minutes from now or tonight...
translation.ko: 5분 후가 될 수도 있고 오늘 밤이 될 수도 있고

translation.en: ...or six months from now or maybe on our wedding night.
translation.ko: 6개월 후, 아니면 결혼식 날이 될 수도 있지만

translation.en: But the really amazing thing is, it is nobody's goddamn business.
translation.ko: 아무도 그걸 알 필요가 없다는 거예요

translation.en: Come on, where's she going?
I thought she was going to take her clothes off.
Demi Moore took her clothes off. This is bullshit.
translation.ko: 데미 무어도 벗었단 말이야 기가 막혀서

translation.en: Come on. Are you kidding me?
-Piss off. -Come here, you punk.
Jack?
That's a mighty snug little shelter, Huck.
translation.ko: 집이 좀 좁은 것 같아 허클베리

translation.en: I judge it's all right.
Here, Jim, I'll take my turn at steering now.
No, that's all right, Huck. I like steering.
Blue Devils!
